item.title: Bulletin updated at 13:02 HKT 14/09/2021
item.description:
At 1 p.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 30 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 81 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 3
Intensity of UV radiation : moderate

Thundery showers continue to develop over the territory. Showers will be heavy in some areas in the next couple of hours. Members of the public should be on the alert.

Please be reminded that:
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 2:30 p.m. today. Isolated thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
